---
name: Add Club/Organization Profiles
about: Implement dedicated club profile pages with information and management tools
title: "Feature: Club Organization Profiles"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Implement a club management system with dedicated profile pages, membership tracking, and admin controls for club organizers.

## New Features
- Club profile pages with description, goals, and leadership info
- Membership system to track club members
- Admin dashboard for club organizers
- Member roles (admin, moderator, member)
- Ability to manage club information and settings

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Club profile pages are viewable by students
- [ ] Admin dashboard functional for club managers
- [ ] Role-based access control working
- [ ] Club information can be updated by admins
